meta.title: ICSD: Soft Closure Until End of School Year

div.h3: Soft Closure Until End of School Year

span.p: Given today's announcement by Governor Herbert, ICSD schools will remain in "soft closure" mode through the end of the school year. Virtual meetings will be held next week after Spring Break to determine our path forward, and more information will be forthcoming. Thank you to ALL for the work being done and service being given.
